languages.text: "Я предположил, что на поиски господина Ульфара. Всем известно, сколь дороги для Космических волков братские узы... Куда крепче тех уз, что связывают их с иными подданными Императора".

"I presumed it was to search for Brother Ulfar. It is common knowledge how deeply Space Wolves value the ties of brotherhood... Far more deeply than the ties that bind them to other subjects of the Emperor."
languages.original_text: "Я предположил, что на поиски господина Ульфара. Всем известно, сколь дороги для Космических волков братские узы... Куда крепче тех уз, что связывают их с иными подданными Императора".

traits.locale_text: "I presumed it was to search for Sir Ulfar. It's common knowledge how much Space Wolves value the ties of brotherhood... Those are much stronger than the ties that bind them to other subjects of the Emperor."

"I presumed it was to search for Sir Ulfar. It's common knowledge how much Space Wolves value the ties of brotherhood... Those are much stronger than the ties that bind them to other subjects of the Emperor."

"I presumed it was to search for Sir Ulfar. It's common knowledge how much Space Wolves value the ties of brotherhood... Those are much stronger than the ties that bind them to other subjects of the Emperor."

"I presumed it was to search for Lord Ulfar. It is common knowledge how deeply Space Wolves value the ties of brotherhood... Far more deeply than the ties that bind them to other subjects of the Emperor."

"I presumed it was to search for Brother Ulfar. It is common knowledge how deeply Space Wolves value the ties of brotherhood... Far more deeply than the ties that bind them to other subjects of the Emperor."

"I presumed it was to search for Brother Ulfar. It is common knowledge how deeply Space Wolves value the ties of brotherhood... Far more deeply than the ties that bind them to other subjects of the Emperor."

languages.text: “我猜他们是打算寻找乌尔法兄弟吧。众所周知，太空野狼非常重视兄弟情谊……他们之间的兄弟情谊，要比帝皇其他臣民之间的联系要深厚得多。”
languages.original_text: "I presumed it was to search for Brother Ulfar. It is common knowledge how deeply Space Wolves value the ties of brotherhood... Far more deeply than the ties that bind them to other subjects of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: “我猜他们是打算寻找乌尔法大人吧。众所周知，太空野狼非常重视兄弟情谊……他们之间的兄弟情谊，要比帝皇其他臣民之间的联系要牢固得多。”

languages.text: 「ブラザー・ウルファーを探すためだと推定していた。スペースウルフが兄弟の絆を大切にする事は、有名だからな…皇帝と関連するどんな絆よりも、強い絆なのだから」
languages.original_text: "I presumed it was to search for Brother Ulfar. It is common knowledge how deeply Space Wolves value the ties of brotherhood... Far more deeply than the ties that bind them to other subjects of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: 「ブラザー・ウルファーを探すためだと推定していた。スペースウルフが兄弟の絆を大切にする事は、有名だからな…皇帝と関連するどんな絆よりも、強い絆なのだから」

languages.text: «Supuse que era para buscar al hermano Ulfar. Es bien sabido lo mucho que los Lobos Espaciales valoran profundamente los lazos de la hermandad... Mucho más profundamente que los otros súbditos del Emperador».
languages.original_text: "I presumed it was to search for Brother Ulfar. It is common knowledge how deeply Space Wolves value the ties of brotherhood... Far more deeply than the ties that bind them to other subjects of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: «Supuse que era para buscar a mi señor Ulfar. Es bien sabido lo mucho que los Lobos Espaciales valoran los lazos de la hermandad... Esos lazos son mucho más fuertes que los que los unen a otros súbditos del Emperador»

languages.text: "Um nach Bruder Ulfar zu suchen, nahm ich an. Es ist allgemein bekannt, wie wichtig den Space Wolves die Bande der Bruderschaft sind ... Viel wichtiger als die Bande, die sie mit anderen Untertanen des Imperators verbinden."
languages.original_text: "I presumed it was to search for Brother Ulfar. It is common knowledge how deeply Space Wolves value the ties of brotherhood... Far more deeply than the ties that bind them to other subjects of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Um nach Sir Ulfar zu suchen, nahm ich an. Es ist allgemein bekannt, wie wichtig den Space Wolves die Bande der Bruderschaft sind ... Sie sind sehr viel stärker als die Bande, die sie mit anderen Untertanen des Imperators verbinden."

languages.text: « Pour retrouver le frère Ulfar, je présume. Les Space Wolves sont animés par un esprit de fraternité bien plus profond que ce qui les lie aux autres sujets de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "I presumed it was to search for Brother Ulfar. It is common knowledge how deeply Space Wolves value the ties of brotherhood... Far more deeply than the ties that bind them to other subjects of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: « Pour retrouver le seigneur Ulfar, je présume. Les Space Wolves sont animés par un esprit de fraternité bien plus fort que ce qui les lie aux autres sujets de l'Empereur. »

languages.text: "Kardeş Ulfar'ı aramak için olsa gerek. Bilindiği üzere Uzay Kurtları, kardeşlik bağlarına çok önem verir... İmparator'un diğer kullarıyla aralarındaki bağlar kıyas konusu bile olmaz."
languages.original_text: "I presumed it was to search for Brother Ulfar. It is common knowledge how deeply Space Wolves value the ties of brotherhood... Far more deeply than the ties that bind them to other subjects of the Emperor."
